articles.title: Deadline
articles.text: Student visa application for October 2017 ended on the 16th of June. It is still possible de apply for short term course until August 25th./n/. April 2018 student visa application just started .

articles.title: Student Blog
articles.text:
We now have a [student blog](https://medium.com/all-about-kyoto) in 3 languages featuring all kinds of information about Kyoto.
